column1: Conjugation of battuo (third conjugation, no passive perfect forms)
Aromanian: bat, batiri  Catalan: batre  Dalmatian: batar, báter  English: batter, battery, combat, debate  French: battre  Friulian: bati  Istro-Romanian: båte  Italian: battere
column3: Occitan: bàter, batre  Portuguese: bater  Romanian: bate, batere  Romansch: batter, batar  Sicilian: bàttiri  Spanish: batir  Venetian: bàtar, bàter
